name: Don't crash (itch)
description:
Avoid street cones and holes by holding your finger on left or right side of the screen.

The music in game is made by Ben Shortt-O'brien.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/allofgamedesign
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/allofgamedesign/

Ben's SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/desertpigeon

Enjoy!
